Donate

I do not accept donations, but thank you for the thought. If you do want to send a token of appreciation, you can donate on my behalf to the following free and open source software projects, which among other things made my tooling development a joy:

  • Vue.js
  • Python Software Foundation

Do leave me (mk2#4590 on Discord) a note if you donate, it will put a smile on my face.
